Content.Text:
Today is Fritz's birthday! Let's make his favorite
foods and throw a party for him! ♪

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, hey, <MYNAME>! What's up?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>You stopped by 'cause you just had to come and
see me, eh? Haha! Just kidding!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wha? You did? Oh, you're gonna throw a party
for my birthday?!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Whoa, that's so cool of you! Woo-hoo! Thanks,
<MYNAME>!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Whoooaaa! Lookit all this food! Did you make all
of it?
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_HEART1_R>Man, it looks really, really good! Time to dig in!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Mmm-mmm-mmm! That was great! Thanks,
<MYNAME>!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Man, I'm so lucky to have a special girl who's
such a great cook! ♪

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_HEART1_R>Seriously, I love you a lot, <MYNAME>. Like, a
LOT a lot!
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R><FACE_LOVE>I, uh, hope we can stay together like this for a
long, long time.
Happy birthday, Fritz! I love you!

Today is Klaus's birthday! Let's make his favorite
foods and throw a party for him! ♪

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>. What is it? Did you need to see
me?

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hm...? Wait, are you throwing a birthday
celebration for me?
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_R><FACE_LAUGH>Thank you. I'm flattered.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Everything looks delicious. I can't imagine the
effort it must have taken to cook so much food.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Well, t'would be a pity to let it grow cold. Shall
we?

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Mmm. Everything was most delicious,
<MYNAME>. Thank you.
<PAGE>
With every bite, I could taste your consideration
for me.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
One does not normally celebrate a birthday
much at my age, but this party of yours was
most excellent.
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_R><FACE_LOVE>I love you, <MYNAME>. So much so that I want
to keep you here and never let you go. Not that I
would, mind you. Ah, well...
Happy birthday, Klaus! I love you!

Today is Raeger's birthday! Let's make his
favorite foods and throw a party for him! ♪

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, hey, <MYNAME>. What's up? Let me guess.
You came because you really wanted to see me?
Ha ha...

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
...What? You're throwing a birthday party for
me?!
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_L><FACE_LOVE>Wow. Thank you, <MYNAME>! I'm...flattered...

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Whoa! You sure made a lot of food! Still,
knowing you did all this just for me makes me
feel really happy.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Best not to let it go cold. Let's dig in!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Mmm! That was excellent. Thanks, <MYNAME>!
<PAGE>
I never really paid much mind to my birthday
before now...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>But with you throwing this amazing party for
me, this year's easily been the best on record!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Thanks, <MYNAME>. I'm flattered and honored
to be with you.
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R><FACE_LOVE>I hope you'll want to stay in this relationship
with me for a long time to come. I love you,
<MYNAME>!
Happy birthday, Raeger! I love you!

Today is Mistel's birthday! Let's make his favorite
foods and throw a party for him! ♪

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<MYNAME>, is something the matter? Did you
need to see me for some reason?

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_PLEASANT_R>Oh? You're throwing a birthday celebration for
me? Why, thank you! How very thoughtful!

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Everything looks delicious. Even from
appearance alone, I can tell how much you were
thinking of me as you made it.
<PAGE>
Well, then, without further ado, let us partake!

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
That was an excellent meal. You have my eternal
gratitude, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
Spending my birthday enjoying both your
company and your homemade meal... I am
blessed indeed.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
I can't begin to express how flattered and
thankful I am at how much effort you put into
ensuring I could have this wonderful experience.
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_HEART2_L><FACE_LOVE>I love you, <MYNAME>. I hope you will stay by
my side -- and no one else's -- till the stars fall
from the sky!
Happy birthday, Mistel! I love you!

Today is Nadi's birthday! Let's make his favorite
foods and throw a party for him! ♪

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh. <MYNAME>. What's up?

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_R>Y-you're throwing a birthday party for me?
Really?! Wow, thanks...

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
All this is for me? Amazing...
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_HEART1_R>Better not let it go cold. Let's eat!

<FACE_NADI><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Mmm. Thanks, <MYNAME>! That was great.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>*urp* Really...really great. Oof, but...I think I
overate... Ugh, I can feel my stomach
stretching...

<FACE_NADI><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Say, uh... I know I always have trouble saying
this kinda thing out loud, but I'm gonna give it a
shot today.
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_HEART2_L><FACE_LOVE><MYNAME>...I love you. Thanks for everything.
Happy birthday, Nadi! I love you!

Today is Kamil's birthday! Let's make his favorite
foods and throw a party for him! ♪

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, hey there, <MYNAME>. What's going on?

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_R>You're throwing a birthday party for me? Thanks!
I'm flattered.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wow. Everything looks so delicious. I can't even
decide where to start.
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_HEART1_R><FACE_LAUGH>Guess I'm going to have to dig in right away if I
don't want it going cold! Let's eat.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Mmm! Everything was really good. Thanks,
<MYNAME>. 
<PAGE>
Just having you throw this little party for me has
made my birthday a really special day.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
<MYNAME>...thanks. Today helped reaffirm
something to me.
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_HEART2_L><FACE_LOVE>I love you, <MYNAME>. I hope we'll celebrate
birthdays together like this again next year, and
for many years after, too.
Happy birthday, Kamil! I love you!

Today is Elise's birthday! Let's make her favorite
foods and throw a party for her! ♪

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
My, I was wondering who it was. Hello,
<MYNAME>. What is it?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, you want to celebrate my birthday? How
thoughtful! Thank you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Did you cook all of this? Amazing! It looks
delicious.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>It would be a pity to let it go cold. Come, let's
eat.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Goodness, you have a rare talent to make such
delectable fare. Thanks to you, I have eaten far
more than I should.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>But it was quite delicious. Thank you.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ever since we began our courtship, I have been
wonderfully happy. You mean so much to me,
<MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_HEART2_L><FACE_LOVE>I love you.
Happy birthday, Elise. I love you!

Today is Iris's birthday! Let's make her favorite
foods and throw a party for her! ♪

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh! Hello, <MYNAME>. What's happening?

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_R>My, you're going to throw me a birthday
celebration? How thoughtful of you! Thank you,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
What a delicious-looking dinner. It must have
taken a lot of effort to cook all this.
<PAGE>
It'd be a shame to let it go cold, then. Let's eat.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Mmm. Now THAT was a meal. Thank you.
<PAGE>
I could taste how much you thought of me with
every bite. It filled up my tummy AND my heart.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_HEART2_L>Hopefully, we can do this again next year.
No...not "hopefully." Let's make sure of it.
<PAGE>
I love you, <MYNAME>.
Happy birthday, Iris. I love you!

Today is Lillie's birthday! Let's make her favorite
foods and throw a party for her! ♪

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wha, <MYNAME>?! Ohmigosh, you surprised
me! Wh-what's up?

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_R>Y-you're throwing a birthday party for me?
Ohmigosh, I'm so happy! Thank you!!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, look at all this food! Did you cook all this?
It looks so good!
<PAGE>
Better not wait for it to get cold. C'mon, let's
eat!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Mmm! That was so yummy! Thanks,
<MYNAME>!
<PAGE>
Still...this means I'd better get practicing,
myself. I can't let you get better than me at
cooking that easily!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Say, um...<MYNAME>? I-I know I always have
trouble saying this, b-but I'm going to give it my
best shot today...
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_HEART2_L><FACE_LOVE>I...I love you. I hope you stay with me for a long,
long time to come...
Happy birthday, Lillie. I love you!

Today is Agate's birthday! Let's make her favorite
foods and throw a party for her! ♪

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah! <MYNAME>! Hi! Did you come to see me?

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_L>Oooh... You're going to throw a birthday party
for me? Wow, thank you! ♪

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Whoooooa... Look at all this yummy food! I can
hardly believe it!
<PAGE>
Come on, let's dig in! <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Yum! ♪ Aaah, that was unbelievable. I feel as
full and as happy as I've ever been now!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Today turned into a really great birthday,
<MYNAME>. One of the best of all time! Thank
you!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R>Heh. I think I love you even more now,
<MYNAME>. ♪
<PAGE>
I hope you'll stay together with me forever and
ever and ever!
Happy birthday, Agate! I love you!

Today is Angela's birthday! Let's make her
favorite foods and throw a party for her! ♪

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>? Did you need to see me for
something?

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You're having a birthday party for me? Well,
aren't you the diligent one?
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_R><FACE_LAUGH>Thank you. I'm very flattered.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
All this food...just for me? And it looks so
delicious.
<PAGE>
Well then, let's eat before it goes cold.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Mmm. That was delicious. I think I may have
overeaten. Thank you.
<PAGE>
You've made today one of the most special
birthdays I've ever had.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_HEART2_L>Thank you, <MYNAME>. I...I love you.
Happy birthday, Angela. I love you!

Today is Licorice's birthday! Let's make her
favorite foods and throw a party for her! ♪

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>. What is it? Did you need to see
me?

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_L>You are throwing a birthday celebration for me?
R-really...? Thank you. I-I'm flattered.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Look at all this food. Did you really make all of
this just for me?
<PAGE>
W-we shouldn't let it go cold, then. Let's eat.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Thank you, <MYNAME>. That was so good I
couldn't help but overeat.
<PAGE>
I'm so lucky to have someone who'll do all this
for my birthday.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_HEART2_L><MYNAME>...thank you. I er...I-I...love, you.
Urk...! P-please don't stare at me like that...!
Happy birthday, Licorice. I love you!
